static create ( $  sName = null,
array $  arOptions = array() 
) [static]

Constructs and returns a jQuery widget

The options passed in are dynamically added to the options array and will be accessible and modifiable as normal (.i.e. $this->theme, $this->baseUrl, etc.)

Parameters:
array $arOptions The options for the widget
string $sClass The class of the calling object if different
Returns:

registerClientScripts ( $  bLocateScript = false  ) 

Registers the needed CSS and JavaScript.

Parameters:
boolean If true, system will try to find jquery plugins based on the pattern jquery.<plugin-name[.min].js
Returns:
CClientScript The current app's ClientScript object

Reimplemented from CPSjqUIWrapper.

Definition at line 74 of file CPSMarkItUpWidget.php.

    {
        //  Daddy...
        $this->autoRegister = false;
        
        parent::registerClientScripts( $bLocateScript );
        
        //  Reset the baseUrl
        $this->baseUrl = $this->extLibUrl . self::PS_EXTERNAL_PATH;

        //  Register scripts necessary
        $this->pushScriptFile( "{$this->baseUrl}/jquery.markitup.pack.js" );
        $this->pushScriptFile( "{$this->baseUrl}/sets/{$this->setToUse}/set.js" );
        PS::_rcf( "{$this->baseUrl}/skins/{$this->skinToUse}/style.css" );
        PS::_rcf( "{$this->baseUrl}/sets/{$this->setToUse}/style.css" );
    
        //  Get the javascript for this widget
        $_sScript = $this->generateJavascript( $this->multiUseClass ? $this->multiUseClass : null, $this->settingsToUse );
        $this->registerWidgetScript( $_sScript );
        
        //  Don't forget subclasses
        return PS::_cs();
    }
